title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, May 2, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Dr. Benjamin Spock (New Haven, 1903), who wrote the parenting bible for all the post-war moms and dads raising the baby boomer generation.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Dr. Benjamin Spock (New Haven, 1903), who wrote the parenting bible for all the post-war moms and dads raising the baby boomer generation.
